item.title: CVE-2021-25987|2024-08-03T20:19:19.340Z -- hexo -- hexo
item.description: Hexo versions 0.0.1 to 5.4.0 are vulnerable against stored XSS. The post “body” and “tags” don’t sanitize malicious javascript during web page generation. Local unprivileged attacker can inject arbitrary code.
